pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Southern Historical Collection, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains about 100 items dealing with radio plays, including correspondence, copyright notices, playscripts and other materials, chiefly from the 1930s and 1940s. Some of the radio plays were written by Holman while others were edited by him. Many of the plays were used in the Forum of the Air series which aired in the late 1930s.
